title: tillaanaa (pahaaDi)
sahitya:
dhIm tadhIm dhiranA taka dhIm tadhIm tana dhIm dhIm takiTa tana

(dhIm)



anupallavi



dhIm tajhaNu dhIm takajhaNu tOm jhaNu

tattit-taLAngu tarikiTa takajhaNu tOm

tittaLAngu tarikiTa takajhaNu tOm taLAngu tarikiTa takajhaNu

(dhIm)



caraNam



enadannai tandai ena nIyE manamirangi Ezhai enakkaruLvAyE mana

mOhananE mayil vAhananE vanakkuratti magizhum maNaALa guhanE



sholkaTTu



tOm tadhIm tadHim tattOm tadhIm takatOm tadhIm tadhIm takiTa

tarita jhaNu takiTa tajjham

taka tajjham tarikiTa tajham taka tarikiTa tajham  takatiku

tarikiTa dhIm dhIm dhIm takaNaka

tarikiTa dhIm takaNaka tarikiTa takaNaka tarikiTa takaNaka

tarikiTa tana 

(dhIm)
